history.details: SGML was standardized after two years of review and development from the GML language developed at IBM. (source)
Jon Bosak, now known as xml:Father, initiated the development of XML as a way to efficiently provide the Web with the power of SGML

JSON began as a way to make a more machine-based information transport that was still human-readable. Its goal has been to improve on XML from the start. Douglas Crockford originally specified and popularised the structure around 2001. It appears to be taking over the web rapidly, being very popular in AJAX, used to make web pages interactive.
